summary.span: 提供延後載入和關聯性維護，以用於 LINQ to SQL 應用程式中一對多和一對一關聯性的集合端。

span.span: Provides for deferred loading and relationship maintenance for the collection side of one-to-many and one-to-one relationships in a LINQ to SQL applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列 C# 範例會示範這個方法的其中一種用法：The following C# sample shows one use of this method: ``` var customer = (from c in db.Customers where c.CustomerID == "ALFKI" select c).Single(); Order[] orderArray = new Order[customer.Orders.Count]; ``` 客戶。Orders.CopyTo (orderArray，0); 在 Visual Basic:customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0);In Visual Basic: ``` Dim customer = (From c In db.Customers _ Where c.CustomerID = "ALFKI" _ Select c).[Single]() Dim orderArray As Order() = New Order(customer.Orders.Count - 1) {} customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray, 0) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 載入 」，表示已載入資料，在具體化期間或在延後載入。"Loaded" means that the data was loaded during materialization or at deferred loading. 「 指派 」 表示，您已手動指定資料值。"Assigned" means that you have manually given the data a value.
